title: Chests & Keys
body: How exactly can i earn them?

replies.body:
There are a couple different ways! You can find all the details over here in the [**Hextech Crafting Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233), but here are a couple snippets while you're here ;).


https://i.gyazo.com/183a02d4a507a1cb03ce0d10a603bfd6.png

https://i.gyazo.com/9ddf0f0e31accc5237c6c90b9e17e811.png

Key fragments are earned through the honor system, and chests are obtained by earning S ranks on different champions, or being in queue with someone else who earns an S. You can check out the [Honor Update](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/honor) and see the rewards section at the bottom, and then there's the [Hextech Crafting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide).
